column2: No need to scan scope for global inspection

column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
Your case is running "Inspect Code..." action with an empty inspection profile?
@batya239, no, my case is "Run inspection by name". I made an inspection that helps me to perform sophisticated refactoring. It is designed to be executed on a whole project at once.
@klikh, no I haven't. Will do it shortly.
